sentence: One important ______ of this plant is its ability to grow in dry soil.
sentence_translation: 这种植物的一个重要特点是它能在干燥的土壤中生长。

sentence: The ______ distribution of animals is closely related to climate.
sentence_translation: 动物的地理分布与气候密切相关。

sentence: We need to develop a new ______ to increase sales this year.
sentence_translation: 我们需要制定新策略来提高今年的销售额。

sentence: Our main ______ is to finish the project before the end of the month.
sentence_translation: 我们的主要目标是在月底前完成这个项目。

sentence: The course covers many topics, ______ history and culture of the region.
sentence_translation: 这门课程涵盖多个主题，具体来说包括该地区的历史和文化。

sentence: The company plans to ______ its products to attract more customers.
sentence_translation: 公司计划使产品多样化以吸引更多顾客。

sentence: The city has a ______ population with people from many countries.
sentence_translation: 这座城市人口多样化，有来自许多国家的人。

sentence: Hard work can help you ______ your dreams and goals.
sentence_translation: 努力工作能帮助你实现梦想和目标。

sentence: The computer ______ shows clear images and videos.
sentence_translation: 这台电脑显示器显示的图像和视频很清晰。

sentence: This area has ______ for development in the tourism industry.
sentence_translation: 这个地区在旅游业方面有发展潜力。

sentence: Lack of funding is the main ______ to completing the project.
sentence_translation: 资金短缺是完成这个项目的主要阻碍。

sentence: We need to consider every ______ of the problem before making a decision.
sentence_translation: 我们需要考虑问题的每个方面后再做决定。

sentence: The marketing ______ is responsible for promoting new products.
sentence_translation: 市场部门负责推广新产品。

sentence: ______ customers often support the brand even when prices rise.
sentence_translation: 即使价格上涨，忠诚的顾客也常常支持这个品牌。

sentence: This is an ______ company with a history of over 50 years.
sentence_translation: 这是一家公认的公司，有50多年的历史。

sentence: She had an unexpected ______ with her old teacher in the supermarket.
sentence_translation: 她在超市意外遇见了她的老教师。

sentence: He is ______ that he will pass the exam with good preparation.
sentence_translation: 他有信心，只要做好准备就能通过考试。

sentence: Regular exercise can ______ improve your physical health.
sentence_translation: 有规律的锻炼能有效改善你的身体健康。

sentence: Many kinds of fish live in the deep ______ far from the shore.
sentence_translation: 许多种鱼生活在远离海岸的深海中。

sentence: The company's ______ to the customer's complaint was prompt and helpful.
sentence_translation: 公司对顾客投诉的回应迅速且有帮助。

sentence: The researcher took a ______ of water from the river to test its quality.
sentence_translation: 研究人员从河里取了水样来测试其质量。

sentence: An ______ worker can finish more tasks in less time.
sentence_translation: 高效的工人能在更少的时间内完成更多任务。

sentence: Water is a valuable natural ______ that we should not waste.
sentence_translation: 水是宝贵的自然资源，我们不应该浪费。

sentence: There has been a significant ______ in the number of students this year.
sentence_translation: 今年学生的数量有了显著增加。

sentence: One ______ of living in the city is easy access to public transport.
sentence_translation: 住在城市的一个优势是公共交通便利。

sentence: The new park has great ______ for families with children.
sentence_translation: 这个新公园对有孩子的家庭有很大吸引力。

sentence: The shop assistant was very polite to every ______ who came in.
sentence_translation: 店员对每个进店的顾客都很有礼貌。

sentence: A small bird built its nest on a ______ of the big tree.
sentence_translation: 一只小鸟在大树的一根树枝上筑了巢。

sentence: Scientists are working to ______ new medicines for treating diseases.
sentence_translation: 科学家们正在努力研发治疗疾病的新药。

sentence: We need to improve the ______ system rather than build a new one.
sentence_translation: 我们需要改进现有的系统，而不是建新的。

sentence: The team will ______ the plan in detail at tomorrow's meeting.
sentence_translation: 团队将在明天的会议上详细讨论这个计划。

sentence: There is an ______ number of people choosing to work from home.
sentence_translation: 越来越多的人选择居家办公。

sentence: He wore a warm ______ to protect himself from the cold wind.
sentence_translation: 他穿了一件暖和的夹克来抵御寒风。

sentence: It is ______ to rain tomorrow, so we should take umbrellas.
sentence_translation: 明天可能会下雨，所以我们应该带伞。

sentence: The company's new ______ has received positive reviews from users.
sentence_translation: 公司的新产品得到了用户的好评。

sentence: The hotel's ______ near the airport makes it convenient for travelers.
sentence_translation: 这家酒店位于机场附近，对旅行者来说很方便。

sentence: The store achieved record ______ during the holiday season.
sentence_translation: 这家商店在节日期间创下了销售纪录。

sentence: Please clean the ______ of the TV to make the picture clearer.
sentence_translation: 请擦拭电视屏幕，让画面更清晰。

sentence: The two brothers have ______ personalities and interests.
sentence_translation: 这两兄弟有着相似的性格和兴趣。

sentence: They plan to ______ in the mountains during the winter vacation.
sentence_translation: 他们计划寒假去山里滑雪。

sentence: ______ is a popular winter sport in cold regions around the world.
sentence_translation: 滑雪是全球寒冷地区流行的冬季运动。

sentence: It takes training to ______ this machine safely and correctly.
sentence_translation: 操作这台机器需要接受培训，以确保安全和正确。

sentence: ______ advances have changed the way we live and work.
sentence_translation: 技术进步改变了我们的生活和工作方式。

sentence: New ______ is being developed to reduce environmental pollution.
sentence_translation: 正在研发新技术以减少环境污染。

sentence: The ______ of applying for a visa can be complicated and time-consuming.
sentence_translation: 申请签证的过程可能复杂且耗时。

sentence: The hotel will ______ free breakfast for all its guests.
sentence_translation: 这家酒店将为所有客人提供免费早餐。

sentence: We always prioritize ______ over quantity when producing our goods.
sentence_translation: 我们生产产品时总是优先考虑质量而非数量。

sentence: We decided to eat at a small ______ with good reviews near the park.
sentence_translation: 我们决定去公园附近一家评价不错的小餐馆吃饭。

sentence: Her hard work and determination led to her ______ in the competition.
sentence_translation: 她的努力和决心使她在比赛中取得了成功。

sentence: People ______ eat more food during cold winter months.
sentence_translation: 在寒冷的冬季，人们倾向于吃更多食物。

sentence: Please ______ you lock the door before leaving the house.
sentence_translation: 离开家前请确保锁好门。

sentence: Students who study regularly ______ ______ ______ pass their exams.
sentence_translation: 经常学习的学生更有可能通过考试。

sentence: ______ ______ ______, we can solve the problem efficiently and quickly.
sentence_translation: 这样，我们就能高效快速地解决这个问题。

sentence: The university opened a ______ ______ ______ the science department last year.
sentence_translation: 这所大学去年开设了科学系的一个新分支。

sentence: ______ this city ______ ______ ______, we can see how technology changes life.
sentence_translation: 以这座城市为例，我们可以看到科技如何改变生活。

sentence: This is a ______ ______ brand for producing high-quality watches.
sentence_translation: 这是一个生产高品质手表的知名品牌。

sentence: Reading is ______ ______ ______ his daily routine for many years.
sentence_translation: 多年来，阅读一直是他日常生活的一部分。

sentence: They need to ______ ______ ______ a solution to the problem by Friday.
sentence_translation: 他们需要在周五前想出这个问题的解决方案。

sentence: The team ______ ______ ______ winning the championship this year.
sentence_translation: 这个团队有信心今年赢得冠军。

sentence: The weather forecast says it ______ ______ ______ a sunny day tomorrow.
sentence_translation: 天气预报说明天将会是晴天。
